citations.narrative:
A review of records for animal ID#44 26436 showed that the post -op observations were not being conducted at a
frequency as described in the IACUC approved protocol. The protocol stated that for 3 days following a procedure the pig
would be examined twice daily. The date of the procedure was 1/5/23 and according to the record only one clinical
observation was recorded for the second day (1/7/23). This could negatively affect the animal if post-procedure care and
observations are not conducted at the required intervals. Personnel must conduct and document observations at a
frequency in accordance with the IACUC approved protocol. The facility must correct this issue.
********Correct by June 2, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n
